request.description: Upload a new company paper (PDF only, max 10MB)
Get all papers including inactive ones (for debugging)
Get all active money transactions sorted by date
Get a specific transaction by its ID

Add a new money transaction. Required fields: amount (positive number), type (pay/take), toWhom, sendTo (Company/Manager/Sikari/Security), receiverName, description, username. The username field is required and must be included in the request body.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Transaction added successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": "65c4e8b8f3c1234567890123",
    "amount": 1000,
    "type": "pay",
    "toWhom": "John Doe",
    "sendTo": "Manager",
    "receiverName": "John Doe",
    "receiverId": "12345",
    "pay": true,
    "received": false,
    "description": "Salary payment",
    "username": "admin",
    "date": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
